data.actual_result: Sort option shows when long pressing but not when you tap the 3 dots button, which is inconsistent and disturbing for peopel who prefer opening server options via 3 dots rather than by long pressing
data.expected_result: Sort option should be available no matter how you open the action sheet, because it's supposed to be the same sheet
data.short_description: Sort option is available when long-pressing a server in the channel drawer, but is missing when tapping 3 dots button, even though it's the exact same menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Open channel drawer - Switch to a server - Tap the 3 dots icon at top right of the drawer - Notice Sort option is missing - Now long press on the server in the list - Notice Sort option is here
